Field Detail

UNLIMITED_HITS

static final int UNLIMITED_HITS
The highest number of hits we ever expect to reasonably manage.

Note that Integer.MAX_VALUE is *NOT* an option because of how lucene uses this variable. Sometimes lucene adds to the number of and sometimes it fails to put other bounds on what is collected, causing OutOfMemory errors.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
